com.impossibl.stencil.api

Interface TemplateSource

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    InlineTemplateSource, URLTemplateSource

    public interface TemplateSource
extends Closeable
    Template source information. Returned from TemplateSourceLoader.find(String)
    Author:
    kdubb

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getTag()
      Get a unique tag for the template source.
      URI getURI()
      Get the absolute URI of template source.
      Reader openReader()
      Opens a reader for the template source text.
